title: Even Me
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c v5 c v6 c

v1: Lord, I hear of show'rs of blessing
Thou art scatt'ring full and free;
Let some drops now fall on me,
v2: Pass me not, O gracious Father!
Sinful tho' my heart may be;
Thou might'st spurn me, but the rather
Let Thy mercy fall on me,
v3: Pass me not, O tender Savior!
Let me love and cling to Thee—
I am longing for Thy favor.
When Thou comest, call for me,
v4: Pass me not, O mighty Spirit!
Thou canst make the blind to see;
Speak the word of pow'r to me,
v5: Love of God, so pure and changeless!
Blood of Christ, so rich and free!
Grace of God, so strong and boundless!
v6: Pass me not; but pardon bringing
Bind my heart, O Lord, to Thee:
While the streams of life are springing,
c1: Let some drops now fall on me.
